author: Shuvam Banerji Seal, Alok Mishra, Aheli Poddar

inequality_metrics.interpretation: Higher value indicates more inequality in enrollment distribution

tests.h0: No difference in enrollment across regions
tests.h1: At least one region differs significantly

tests.h0: No difference between weekend and weekday enrollment
tests.h1: Enrollment differs between weekends and weekdays

tests.h0: No difference in enrollment across HDI groups
tests.h1: At least one HDI group differs
